message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still not sure if $90 is a good deal for me. I'd be willing to pay $82 for the product.
